content:
"""
I have successfully harvested 10 pieces of stone, along with the previously collected 5 pieces of coal and 5 pieces of iron ore. 

Now that I have enough stone, I can craft a stone furnace. Let's proceed with that.

I will use the available resources to craft one stone furnace.
"""

# Craft a stone furnace using the collected resources
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=1)
print(f"Inventory after crafting stone furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")
